--- In nbwrpg@y..., "rAuq" <rauq@t...> wrote:
> Nicely written post. =)
> 
> On 4 Apr 2001, at 4:02, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> 
> > ::Prowl::
> > 
> > Images began to invade Prowl's mind, seeing Iron Raptor beneath
> > Megatron's foot. His eyes widened, trying to blot the image out of
his
> > mind, but not succeeding. Depth Charge's offer to help went
unnoticed
> > as Prowl backed up in the air.
> > 
> > "NO!" Prowl yelled, now completely unaware of his surroundings.
What
> > was in his head was his reality. External no longer mattered, the
> > battle was in his head.
> > 
> > He struggled against the imaginary bonds, hate for Megatron
beginning
> > to fill him. But it wasn't because of that scene alone. Something
from
> > his past, something he couldn't remember, fueled it as well. He
> > jerked, trying to break the bonds that prevented him from getting
to
> > Megatron. Some shots whizzed by him in the real world, but he
didn't
> > care.
> > 
> > As anger and a feeling of helplessness mounted, another
conciousness
> > began to rise up in Prowl, the same thing he had felt the first
time
> > he had transformed into his monstrous second beast mode, and it
was
> > happening again.
> > 
> > In his mind, his body expanded, the bonds that held him to the
wall
> > groaning and then snapping as he grew. His wings shot out further
> > behind him, and his body transformed to something like a blend
between
> > a human and a raptor, his back legs buffer than his front ones but
> > about the same length. The head was part that of an owl, with a
raptor
> > jaw instead of a beak. Feathers stuck out of the cracks in between
his
> > armor. Prowl didn't realize that the same changes were happening
to
> > him in the real world.
> > 
> > He was now standing in the room, topping 20 feet and glaring down
at
> > Megatron. With an enraged roar, Prowl leapt forward, snapping at
> > Megatron with his massive jaws. In reality, he was soaring toward
> > Halucigen, doing the exactly same action that he was attempting to
do
> > on the imaginary Megatron.
> > 
> > 
> > 
> > 
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@y..., gunthers8@n... wrote:
> > > OOC: I was going to let you do it but i think i will do it if
that
> > is
> > > ok...
> > > 
> > > ::Halucigen::
> > > Halucigen started entering horrid graphics into the mind of
Prowl
> > > finding it diffucult for his large mind control.  He started to
flow
> > > the images of his love Iron Raptor beneath of Megatron's foot
> > > helpless..Prowl bound up on a wall being forced ot watch it all
> > unable
> > > to help....
> > > Unrelentlessly he pushed his mind force against Prowls trying to
> > break
> > > through and make him beleive.....
